other_tests.findings: Initial blood level of phenytoin was 25 µg/ml (normal= 10-20) and of primidone was 36 µg/ml (normal= 15-30).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Repeat blood levels on discharge showed 9 µg/ml of phenytoin and 16 µg/ml of primidone.

other_tests.findings: Moderate slow wave activity without evidence of an epileptic focus.
Phenytoin level was 43 µg/ml and primidone level was 6 µg/ml.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Later phenytoin level dropped to 11 µg/ml after dosage adjustment.
